title: Fighter

Fighter
-------

### Strength: `4D`

- Bastard Sword: `5D`
- Climbing: `5D+2`
- Jumping: `5D+1`

### Dexterity: `3D`

- Composite Longbow: `4D`
- Horse Riding: `4D`

### Constitution: `4D`

- Fortitude: `5D`

### Intelligence: `2D`

### Wisdom: `2D`

### Charisma: `3D`

Dwarf Species
-------------
